author: John Falkenberg
title: DHS Authorizes The Hiring of 10,000 Immigration Officers To Battle Illegal Immigration
text:
Trump’s Helping Victims of Illegals… Using Funds Set Aside to Defend Illegals! 
“Federal immigration law both imposes the responsibility and provides the means for the federal government, in cooperation with the states, to secure the nation’s borders,” it read. 
“The purpose of this order is to direct executive departments and agencies to deploy all lawful means to secure the nation’s southern border with Mexico, to prevent further illegal immigration into the United States, and to repatriate illegal aliens swiftly, consistently, and humanely.” 
The order also tells the Director of Homeland Security “to hire an additional 5,000 border agents and to empower state and local law enforcement to support federal enforcement of immigration law, to the maximum extent permitted by law, and to ensure that prosecution guidelines place a high priority on crimes having a nexus to our southern border.” Advertisement – story continues below 
Kelly has called for 10,000 additional ICE officers and 5,000 new hires at the Customs and Border Protection Agency. 
“The surge of immigration at the southern border has overwhelmed federal agencies and resources and has created a significant national security vulnerability to the United States,” he wrote, referencing a spike of border apprehensions between 2015 and 2016. 
It appears as if Trump is making good on his promises to lock down the southern border.
